author: Staff Reporter
text:
Some miscreants pelted stones at two State-owned public transport buses in different incidents that took place in the city on Wednesday.

Front wind shields of the buses were damaged in the attack. The city police have registered a case and are investigating.

Meanwhile, a large number of police personnel was deployed along the routes where the body of a Hindu Munnani leader was taken out in procession for cremation.
title: Buses stoned
